title: azhagu tirumEni
sahitya:
azhagu tirumEni sondam uNDu (unran vaDi) adan aruLil enakkoru pangum uNDu paramA


anupallavi

  vazhi vazhiyAi munnOr tam nirai shelvattil vazhi vandOn enra muraiyinil urimaiyil


caraNam    padamalar gangaiyil punita nIrADi bhaktiyuDan kazhal pUjittu dhyAnittu
 pugazh tarum abhaya karattilen kali tIrttu pozhi kamala nayana aruLinai uNDu
			madhyamakAlam
pankaja karam tigazh Azhi veN shankena paranda mArbinil ilangum tiruvena
 parpala kOTi uyir urai maNiyena paraman-unnODenrum onri uraindiDa
